answers.answer: Haven't had pains since about 6 months but my breast have been super itchy its so uncomfortable. Im 8 months.
Im due nov 12 also , my boobs have also bin hurting. And ive bin getting contractions.  Do u think your going 2 give bith before the 12? i hope i do. What are u haveing ?

Okay good I'm not alone. My boobs are also itchy like crazy. It ***** if this is what my boobs feel like now I can't imagine what breastfeedings going to be like with someone constantly sucking and pulling on them. I've been having contractions too well they stopped last night and none today but for 2 days I was in horrible pain and outta no where just stopped. So I'm not really sure if I'm going to go into labor soon. In a way a really want to I'm so miserable inside and out I can barely walk bc my feet are so swollen they feel like they're going to explode, same with my stomach its stretched so tight its hard as a rock. My hands and face are swollen. Im constipaped nauseas and to top it off I have a horrible skin rash called PUPPS on my already uncomfortable enough stomach where its like these little pimples that are so itchy and sensetive spread all over you. They get infected and burn and tear open. But in another way I want to deliver on my due date the 12th bc his birthday will be 11-12-13  and I still need to put his clothes away. I'm so exhausted and I feel like gravity is torturing me.
Oh and I'm having a boy wbu?

My stomach has bin very hard and tight also ive bin contacting all week but not longer then a half hourIm ready to meet my daughter already tho . If u are swollen all over this might me a sighn of preeclampsia and is dangerous. They might induce tou if u go to the e.r
Im haveing alittlw girl named sophia raquel <3Also how old are u ? Is this your 1st child ?
I will b 36wks Wednesday n mines jus started leaking n bein sore n itchy ugh it is so irritating
Im 38 w & 3 and my boobs feel fine but I get contractions. Back hurts and I just can't wait
Awh that's a cute name!  I'm 21 and yes this is my first :) the pain in my boobs is finally gone yay! Now they're just itchy.
How old are you? And what # is this for you?

question: I'm 39 weeks tomorrow and my boobs are soo sore and ache all day plus my nipples burn and sting. I think its bc my milk is setting in. Just wondering if anyone else is having boob pains that is this far along lol
title: my boobs are killing me!!!
